    • Method Detail

      • add

        void add(by.batseko.library.entity.book.Book book,
         int quantity)
  throws by.batseko.library.exception.LibraryServiceException
        Saves Book, add quantity of BookInstances.
        Parameters:
        book - Book instance
        quantity - is quantity of BookInstances.
        Throws:
        by.batseko.library.exception.LibraryServiceException - if book's fields not accords to specify pattern BookValidator or if Book with this fields has already exist or if an error occurs while writing new Book into data source

      • findAllBookDTO

        java.util.List<by.batseko.library.dto.BookDTO> findAllBookDTO(int currentPage,
                                                              int recordsPerPage)
                                                       throws by.batseko.library.exception.LibraryServiceException
        Find all book list of BookDTO
        Parameters:
        currentPage - is the current page parameter for pagination
        recordsPerPage - is the records per page parameter for pagination
        Returns:
        all book list BookDTO
        Throws:
        by.batseko.library.exception.LibraryServiceException - occurs after searching Book into the data source

      • findBookQuantityByFields

        int findBookQuantityByFields(by.batseko.library.entity.book.Book book)
                      throws by.batseko.library.exception.LibraryServiceException
        Find quantity of BookDTOs which follow the book fields pattern
        Parameters:
        book - is the Book which contains non-empty fields which using to construct search query into DAO layer
        Returns:
        quantity of BookDTOs which follow the book fields pattern
        Throws:
        by.batseko.library.exception.LibraryServiceException - if BookDTO list is empty or if book is null or occurs after searching Book into the data source

                                                     throws by.batseko.library.exception.LibraryServiceException
        Find book list of BookDTO which follow the book fields pattern
        Parameters:
        book - is the Book which contains non-empty fields which using to construct search query into DAO layer
        currentPage - is the current page parameter for pagination
        recordsPerPage - is the records per page parameter for pagination
        Returns:
        book list BookDTO which follow the book fields pattern
        Throws:
        by.batseko.library.exception.LibraryServiceException - if BookDTO is empty or if book is null or occurs after searching Book into the data source

        Find book Book instance by uuid
        Parameters:
        uuid - Book's uuid
        Returns:
        Book instance
        Throws:
        by.batseko.library.exception.LibraryServiceException - if Book with uuid do not present into data source or if an error occurs while searching Book into the data source
